name: Stick The Meat Muncher
description:
"Stick The Meat Muncher"

there was this one time a dude called Stick who like munched down on like over thirty steaks in like under a minute that was awesome, ever since we started calling him "Stick The Meat Muncher", yeah.

but then he started saying weird stuff like:

  • WASD - Move
  • ESC - QUIT

Made by:

@Mjojoart
